mapper.select: SELECT comment_id AS commentId, parent_comment_id AS parentCommentId, depth, post_id AS postId, user_id AS userId, content, like_count AS likeCount, created_at AS createdAt, updated_at AS updatedAt FROM comments WHERE post_id = #{postId};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comments (post_id, parent_comment_id, user_id, content) VALUES (#{addCommentRequestDto.postId}, #{addCommentRequestDto.parentCommentId}, #{userId}, #{addCommentRequestDto.content})
